assertions.description: Check that settlement account value changes by transfer amount
Check that position account value remains unchanged
check that interchange fee have been changed by

exec: console.log('extracted testfsp3 settlement balance after first transfer ACTUAL',environment.testfsp3SettlementBalanceAfterActual);

console.log('calculated testfsp3 settlement balance before transfers '+environment.testfsp3SettlementBalanceBefore +' transfer amount -'+transferAmount, environment.testfsp3SettlementBalanceAfterExpected);
break; // lets break out of while loop
console.log(`Everything is NOT OK, lets wait for ${maxRetryWait}ms, and try again...`)

assertions.description: Check that settlement account value changed after transfers
check agregates for interchange fees calculated correctly

exec: environment.testfsp1SettlementBalanceAfterExpected = Number.parseFloat(environment.testfsp1SettlementBalanceBefore) + Number.parseFloat(15) - Number.parseFloat(158.36) + Number.parseFloat(87.88) + Number.parseFloat(211.15) + Number.parseFloat(14.21) + Number.parseFloat(150);
//@TODO adjust rounding balance (2 decimals || 3 decimals after the point).
break; // lets break out of while loop
console.log(`Everything is NOT OK, lets wait for ${maxRetryWait}ms, and try again...`)
